caption:
This photograph features a serene outdoor landscape, capturing two deer on a sloping hillside. The hill is bathed in a warm, natural light that highlights the gradient from a deeper, shadowed green at the top to a brighter, sunlit green and yellow closer to the bottom where the deer are standing. These deer, centered in the image and spaced slightly apart, add a sense of peaceful wildlife presence to the scene.

The background is composed predominantly of the hill, which fills the frame diagonally from the upper left corner to the bottom right, creating a dynamic visual flow. Above the hill, there appears to be a darker area which might suggest the presence of foliage or shadows cast by trees just outside the frame. The environment looks natural and undisturbed, suggesting a remote or protected area.

The lighting and vivid colors in the photograph give it a vibrant, almost picturesque quality, emphasizing the beauty of the natural setting and the grace of the deer within it. The overall composition and the presence of wildlife evoke a sense of tranquility and a connection to nature.
title: Deer at sunset.  (from the sites exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17.)
